snippet.title: Rollcage: Stage II - Intro
snippet.description:
There are two games I revere as the greatest games ever made. These two stand far and above any other games ever made, as far as I'm concerned.

One of them is Sonic 3 & Knuckles. With both parts released in 1994, this year will see its 20th Anniversary - so expect me to cover a lot of the music in the game in the coming year.

The other is Rollcage: Stage II. I don't think I could possibly give S3K a ton of attention without also giving it to RC2. It'd be like picking a favourite child.

Since there aren't enough Rollcage: Stage II videos on YouTube, I'm fixing that. I'll be covering EVERY mode - all of the Campaigns, all of the Time Trial modes, Training, Scramble, Survivor, Demolition, All Tracks, Pursuit, Combat, and even Rubble Soccer. I'll also go back at the end and play Masters with the cheat that makes it even harder, with Mirror Mode on to show that off too.

This game needs more love, and this year, I'm giving it.
